website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty seat cover acts as a shield from pet damage in cars, trucks, and SUVs.
pros: A unique hammock-style padded cover protects your seat, isolates dirt, and keeps your dog comfortable
Easy to fold and tuck away when pets aren’t on board
Attaches with simple loops over the headrest and comes in 2 sizes to fit most vehicles
cons: Hammock seams may not stand up to abuse from rambunctious pets, and waterproof coating can fail

website_summaries.verdict: With versatile designs that provide a good fit for almost any vehicle, excellent material, and a generous quality guarantee, this seat cover is an investment that is made to last.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for the extra durable material that will stand up to large canine occupants
Features a quilted textured for exceptional comfort
No-slip backing stays put on most seats
cons: A bit challenging to put in place
Some strap issues have been reported, but the warranty provides peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: I have a large active lab that jumps around in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a large active lab that jumps around in the back seat when we get close to our dog park. The entire hammock bottom seam ripped out in our third week of use. I returned to Amazon and received a full refund. I’ve gone back to my 11 year old Duluth Trading Post no frills dog hammock that is worn but solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kerslager

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, wish there were more tie-downs.
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality cover and easy to install. We had bought a less expensive cover prior to this and the flimsy material was too easily manipulated by the dog because she'd rather sit on the seat than the cover. I wish there were something to keep the ends in place a bit more, however. My dog seems to be able to figure out a way! See attached image - she got herself stuck behind the cover without removing any of the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: JL Cardet

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof ? More like water absorbant
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. My dog had an accident in the backseat and this cover did nothing to protect the back seat. The pee essentially ran through the cover and soaked into the bench seat. You should not advertise the product as waterproof when it clearly isn't. Waterproof means no moisture gets through the material. This did NOTHING of the sort. What a waste of $70 dollars. Suggest you buy a picnic blanket with a tarp backing. It would do a better job than this product did.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Broken buckles already
customer_reviews.text: Loved this cover at first, however, 2/4 of the buckles have broken already, and we have only had this since the end of April of this year. Have contacted customer service to get a replacement and still have gotten no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it for our trips to the creek!
customer_reviews.text: This cover works great for us. I have it in my '05 Rav4. I love the hammock in case of quick stops, etc. Keeps the pup from falling off the seat. Fairly easy to get in and out, and easy to clean. Keeps my back seat clean and dry after trips to the creek when she is wet and covered in sand and mud! Also, the seat belt holes are nice for if I have my niece/nephew in the car. I can leave the cover on, drop the hammock, and buckle them in, and keep my seat clean from snack crumbs and spills. I throw an extra blanket down for our pup, mostly for comfort. She loves her blankies!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Good on top, bad on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cover for over 3 years and generally like it. It does the job in keeping dirty paw prints off my leather seats. And it's easy to take on and off. The problem is the rubber on the bottom that prevents it from slipping. It sheds tiny balls all over the seat that are a pain to clean up. I wash it a couple of times a year, and that may be contributing to the rubber backing breaking down. But you can't have a dog seat cover that's not washable. For the price, I had hoped the quality of this would be better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kussman

customer_reviews.title: Need my hammock replaced already
customer_reviews.text: This product says lifetime warranty but theyve made it impossible to figure out how to return and place the hammock cover I bought. My dog is not hyper or jumpy but this product has torn in several places and the strap tore off. Very upset since I paid $70 or $80 for this and I need it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Nemchick

customer_reviews.title: Best seat cover and seller
customer_reviews.text: This is my second 4Knines Dog Seat Cover with Hammock for our second vehicle. The cover provides great protection for the seats and we use the hammock portion as extended protection for the floor. One vehicle is a mini-van which we stow the center seats and use the cover on the back seat. The hammock blocks the dog hair from going under that seat and extends onto the floor. The other vehicle is a suv and has a similar setup. The manufacturers/sellers are also great. They are dog people and suggested using the hammock portion for the additional protection. On top of all that...everything is made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Hammock is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat cover. It's been hard to find one that will fit my sportier sedan (rather than a larger suv type) but I managed to get this one to install correctly and safely! The hammock is the best part of this cover, especially with a puppy. It's kept her (~20lbs) in the backseat every time; the fasteners attach around the front seat headrests, so it's not the most attractive thing, but utility outweighs that. They've never come undone, so she's never fallen into the well between the seats. Great
customer_reviews.author: PWN3DTop Contributor: Action Figures

customer_reviews.title: cut and materials are great. The seatbelt slots and side flaps are really ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dog did not travel well with the two previous seat covers we tried - primarily because there was no grip between the cover and the seat. This gave our pet no traction, and he just had no confidence in his footing (or lying) to relax. Plus both of them were cheap materials that just balled up and got in the way. This cover is outstanding. It's grippy bottom does NOT slide around on the seat, and our dog is much more relaxed. The fit, cut and materials are great. The seatbelt slots and side flaps are really well-thought-out, so things stay in place. We have a Mercedes-Benz ML350, and the Large size seems like a custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: This slides all over my back seats, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: 4Knines worked with me on different options until one was found that works for my dog. They went well beyond offering support for this product, and i'd certainly look for their name if I had a need for another seat cover. Original Review: This slides all over my back seats, and the dog hates getting in because of it. I've got the pieces tucked into the seat, but it still moves all around and he is constantly trying to keep from falling over. The front flap is also low enough that he puts his feet over it and stands on the center console. This is in a GTI with a ~65lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: tomatthe

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, but doesn't hold up after washing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat cover a year ago in July. We have loved it! It's been super awesome for my dog. We do a lot of traveling and our dog goes everywhere with us. I have had to wash the cover several times. I wash it on gentle because I'm scared it will mess up the cover. The cover has started to unravel and now has a few big holes in it and has started to unravel. It still works great and we love it, but for the amount of money we paid it's not holding up. It does the job, but has quickly torn up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this product. It could, however, use improvements. (1) The mesh on the underside of the bottom - the part that rests on the seat - is tearing apart in a few places. (2) The Velcro strips along the seam where the bottom piece meets the rear have really weak stitching and have torn free from the cover. (3) The "buckles" though which pass the straps that are used to anchor the cover to the headrests do not have enough friction to hold the cover with the desired positioning.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Straps Keep Loosening; Rollers Pop Out
customer_reviews.text: If the seat cover had ever stayed in place, this would have been a great product. However, if you have a dog that's not a statue, the straps hooked around the headrests will loosen with every movement of every paw. By the end of a 5-mile trip, the whole thing will be more like a deflated hammock. In addition, the rollers that are supposed to secure the bottom of the cover to the seat will constantly pop out. Maybe the positive reviewers have lazy, sleepy dogs?. We have a young dog that moves from one window to the other. We have a dog that MOVES.
customer_reviews.author: Roz Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Design is decent, but he support/product is abysmal. The right hand doesn't know what the left hand is doing. Had a buckle break and the company sent me buckles that weren't even close to fitting, so now I have to "tie" the straps together. I wanted to return, but the company has gone dark and will not respond.....beware of this inferior product! Btw, I earnestly tried to work with them to fix this buckle and have it replaced so I didn't have to send this back...once the return by date passed they will not return calls or emails...what a dishonest, unethical company....beware!
customer_reviews.author: Ofpiste

customer_reviews.title: Best cover so far
customer_reviews.text: I have a 58-lb dog & he has big yeti paws, so I need something HEAVY DUTY. So far, I’ve been happy with this cover and it’s lasted longer than most. PROS- -more heavy duty than other covers I’ve bought -easy to clean with vacuum -durable straps CONS -seatbelt slots have already ripped and the Velcro strips ripped off causing a hole. -anchors are so so and keep coming out of the seats Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this car seat cover for dogs. It deters my Lola from getting into the front. I protects my seats. The only thing I’d changed is the sides there should be some. Something we could flip up and attach on either side to protect the doors. And I think the part that protects the back side of the front seats As well as those sides should be quilted also. Other than that, I love it. Quite sturdy. I pull it out and hose it down. Use a long handled brush to scrub it with soap and throw it over the whatever is available to dry.
customer_reviews.author: SteelOvaries

customer_reviews.title: Very durable except the rubber backing
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well to contain the slobber and fur for our English Mastiff. He's too big for us to have ever used the hammock "mode" so I can't speak to that. We've had it in the Tesla for two years, taking the dog to daycare just about every day. We can't use the seat belts with it, but it's easy to remove. Problem there is the rubber backing continuously deteriorates and leaves black rubber flakes/dust all over the seat. So it's not clean enough for someone to sit on until it gets vacuumed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for months, by no means is this water proof. I'm unsure why that is advertised. I have a portable water bottle for my dog, small amounts of water will leak through on to the seat. I didn't have a problem with minor amounts of water getting through. But, I just went on a long trip with my dog. I could not find anywhere safe to turn off and my dog had an accident in back. About 80% of the urine immediately soaked through the cover and into the seat. I should have planned ahead and put potty pads down as a back up, but I didn't and unfortunately I have to deep shampoo my seats now.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB design. Well made and Fido loves to ride in it
customer_reviews.text: Got a new car and knew Fido was going to ride in it eventually. This is VERY well made and fit my car to perfection. Clever design pins the base of the hammock by stuffing something into the back of the seats. TIGHT Velcro allows you access into the seatbelts if you want to use the LATCH or seatbelt connection for Fido. Love this thing. 5*
customer_reviews.author: Eshopperaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! Strap wore out though
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** August 2016 while I do still love this cover unfortunately the strap on the passage we seat completely fell apart and will no longer work with it. Please see pictures. I'm not sure how the strap wore out, possibly sun exposure but I've never had a strap just fall apart like this one. Sad that I can not attach it to the front seats any longer until I find a way to replace the straps. Original review: Love it! Durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scutti's

customer_reviews.title: It's a hair magnet, difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: In general, the cover does what it's supposed to do ... Protect the rear seat. Plus, I like the way it is easy to pass through seat belts and the dog's safety belt. The one thing I really dislike though is that it grabs ahold of dog hair and simply won't let go. My dog is white, so it is very noticeable, and it is impossible to remove the hair with vacuums, water, power washers. If I ever need to replace the cover I'll try a different brand instead if this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dog Seat Cover and Hammock.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made dog seat cover and hammock for our CRV. Fits the entire back seat perfectly. Easy to install. Works perfectly with seat belts and the harness. I can’t believe it took us so long to get one. We’ve been using moving blankets for many years for our dogs. This is so much better and safer too. Next time we take Cosmo for a ride in the car, I’ll take a picture of our happy camper. I think we’ll get one for our Prius too.
customer_reviews.author: DanielJ

customer_reviews.title: great to keep the back seat covered when the dog rides in the truck
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the only issue I have with the cover. After having it for 3 years, both of the back straps have come unattached from the top of the cover and will have to be resewn to the cover. I think part of this is due to how they were sewn, and the other part is due to the 60+ lb. pit who so enjoys rides that the whirling happy tornado in the back seat has caused the damage. After all, it has been three years. No other issues with the cover, still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: forrest2906

customer_reviews.title: Hammock version works great for Honda Accord & two big dogs
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the seat version and it just would not stay in place when I had my large dog in the car. I had great communication with the vendor and I appreciated their responsiveness. I decided to try the hammock version. What I do is unhook the clip/strap placed around the headrest on the side the dogs are entering the car. They can then get in using the floor to help. Then I hook the clip around the headrest (very easy to do) and we have had no problems since. This was the way to go for my situation. To help determine if this is good solution for you: I have Honda Accord, large German Shepherd and small Labrador.
customer_reviews.author: HSR

customer_reviews.title: Best Seat Cover for Fur Kids
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover/hammock is wonderful! The fit is perfect for my Jeep. My fur kids love it cause the material doesn’t make them slide like the last cover we had. I added two wooden crates on the floor and a long pillow over top of the crates. The hammock covers it and allows for wider seating for my dogs. Since the hammock portion is not rated for continuous weight support, this solves that problem. My fur kids love it! Bought XL one for my husbands truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: My last seat cover made by a different brand had a great, thick
customer_reviews.text: Fits back seat really awkwardly & there’s nothing to wrap around the seat belts/no padding to prevent them from digging into leather seats & damaging them when dog cages are on top of the cover. My last seat cover made by a different brand had a great, thick, padded, Velcro portion that wrapped around the seat belt straps preventing them from getting pushed behind the cover, which this doesn’t have. I do like the padding & color, though. It could be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a couple years ago for my mom, and with a new pup of my own, bought another for my girlfriend. This is a great product, which is why I knew to go back and look through my past orders to buy another! High quality, great customer service, and great design. You can tell that these folks are real dog people and have thought about everything when it comes to making a product that works for you and your dog. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shea Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best Seat Cover BY FAR! review after 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: I never come back to add a review after I use a product, especially after 1 year, but this product deserves it. I have tried at least 2 other seat covers and this is by far the best of all. I bought this seat cover a year ago and after many washes in the washing machine and countless trips, it still looks like new! I have a super high energy 60lbs German shorthaired pointer, so trust me when I say that I have put this seat cover to the test. He uses it every single day. I would give it 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made fits my 2015 Tacoma
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this back seat protector for my 2015 Toyota Tacoma double cab. I recently had some custom leather seat covers installed and want to protect them from dirt, dust and the hot sun. This seat protector fit perfectly, I have no pets so the bottom section that would normally attach to the front seat headrests to make a hammock was tucked underneath the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Albino Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits as described.
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover works well. Fit is good for both of our vehicles - one sedan and one an SUV. Only one engineering, future development thought. The cover is smooth and the surface does not “hold” our dogs fur when it sheds. It would be nice if the surface were such that the fur would almost stick to it and. not blow around in the car. It’s a well-designed product, overall, and we have one for each car.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Rips if using as a hammock
customer_reviews.text: So i waited to see how well this would wear before writing a review. Love the concept of this but disappointed it keeps ripping at seem. First time it happened i reached out to seller. They were super nice and sent out a new one. This ripped within the warranty and was covered. Second one lasted even less before it also ripped. It rips at the bottom if you use it as a hammock. Maybe having one solid piece would prevent this but going through 2 i will look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Lilabet

customer_reviews.title: Close but not as close as you would like
customer_reviews.text: The thing that is most lacking about it IMHO is that there is no way to keep the cover from moving at the bottom; if it was able to be weighted or strapped at the bottom to keep it from moving so much when my dog gets in and out of the car, it would be a much better product. The way it is made allows it to move way to much, which is annoying and means you have to check that the cover is actually on the seat before you allow the dog to get in each time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Warren Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted-does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: I love this light color for my light interior. I needed this not only for protection of the leather, but also when my dog is in the back seat and if I have to suddenly brake, he doesn’t end up halfway on the floor with no way to get up. This hammock prevents him from that. He’s a senior dog and this works out great. It also has grippers on the underside and flaps that cover edges of seats.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenMaven

customer_reviews.title: Not as puppy proof as desired
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to cover the back leather seats in a Volvo wagon. It fits perfectly well and the non-slip surface works to keep it in place. Unfortunately for the cover, in under 10 minutes, it was chewed through in the center front by our Sheltie. The heavier one I purchased earlier for my Chevy Volt has not been chewed at all. I do not know why this one was so enticing. It is in tatters, but still managed to keep the seat cover clean and free of dirty paw prints. Perhaps it is the lightness of the fabric that made it vulnerable to our 10 month old Sheltie.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce MacDermott

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: Although this is good for keeping fur and dander off your car seats, it is NOT WATERPROOF at all. My dog had an accident in the back after we picked him up from being boarded for the weekend. I wasn't able to get to it right away because we were on the highway when it happened, and by the time I got to it, the liquid had soaked entirely through the cover and into the fabric seats underneath. I ended up having to pay $90 to have a professional clean and deodorize my backseat. I can't believe I paid so much money for what is essentially an oversized towel with some straps on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Zeng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backseat cover a couple of months ago. I noticed last week that a seam was ripping out already. I contacted the 4Knines and they were SO easy to work with and fast! They responded to my email within the day, confirmed my shipping address, and sent replacement (lifetime guarantee!) that arrived just a few days later. I am hopeful that I won't have any more quality issues - but have to say that they made the warranty replacement process so easy and pleasant - well worth paying a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have 80+ pound GSD/Malamute mix dog. She rides nice on this cover. I use it in the canopy style option to keep her contained in the back of my vehicle. Coverage is excellent; has flaps to cover both sides of the back seat by the doors. Worth the price, since it covesr all of the back seat and the back of the front seats (canopy option); is non-slip and protects the seat underneath from spills and stinky accidents.. My dog upchucked on a rough ride up the canyon and the seat cover cleaned nicely by hosing it off and drying. Took the vomit stink out with citrus scented antibacterial spray.
customer_reviews.author: Voltage

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2020 Hyundai Santa Fe. The pups tried it out and it worked great. it does not slip do to the pvc type handles that pin the cover to the seat by tucking between the seat and back junction. The fit is perfect for my vehicle (I purchased the regular size). We are going to try the large size for my husband's F150 next. The material and seams are sturdy and good quality work.
customer_reviews.author: lml

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I have leather seats and a German Shepherd puppy, as well as a Yorkie and a poodle. The poodle gets car sick occasionally, the yorkie thinks he has to bounce around the car like a rabbit and the shepherd slides around at every turn and digs in. I feel like the hammock feature has calmed all three of them down when riding in the car, not to mention saving my leather from dirty dogs and claws. Bonus, when I have my niece and nephew in the car, it’s easy to strap them in and dump out any crumbs. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It is a good cover to protect from everyday wear and tear but ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a good cover to protect from everyday wear and tear but it is not waterproof. I had dog accidents happen twice while using this cover and both times it soaked through to the seat underneath. It you are looking for something that will keep dog hair and damage from claws from thinking you car seat then this is good. If you need protection from ocassional accidents or dog car sickness, look for something else. I would think for the price it would be Waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable if you have a dirty dog.
customer_reviews.text: I use my pickup truck back country to prospect and survey. My 60 lb dogs comes with me. these 100% protect the pickup rear seat, handles mud, water, sharp claws - all with little signs of wear. I machine wash when needed then reinstall. It cleans well - looks new after washing and does not shrink. The seams are not tearing and the buckles not tearing. A must for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Multiple issue quality is not the same as the original
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple issues with this car seat cover. (1) the fabric is so slippery that the dog slides all over the seat (she weighs 49 lbs); (2) dog hair clings to the fabric and cannot be vacuumed off. I had to use a sticky roller and it took a long time to remove all the hair. (3) the hammock isn't wide enough, it does not fit door to door. I would return this but today is the deadline for the return. I have a 4Knines car seat cover purchased in 2015, it is in good condition and much better quality than the hammock. I'm going back to using it.
customer_reviews.author: FG.

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: After many episodes of my dog riding in the back seat, me slamming in the breaks, and him hitting the back of the front seat and landing on the floorboard it was time to take care of my pup. Bought this and it’s a game changer. I can tell he feels more comfortable, I feel more comfortable, and it’s saved his tail a couple of times no doubt. We just had a baby and his care seat base attaches perfectly through the Velcro openings. If you value the safety of your dog buy this now!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Spell

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good -- Excellent experience!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased countless dog hammocks and so far this is the only one that appears to be holding up. I have had plastic buckles break, nylon tears, the non-slip material break down and layer my back seat, and the portion that hangs over the foot wells deteriorate due to my German Shepherds nails and weight. My 4Knines Car Hammock has remained intact and strong. If or when it breaks down, I will definitely purchase another one from them.
customer_reviews.author: Torry M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome company.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, bought in December, 2016. The strap that holds up to to the headrest broke, product was replaced, all that was needed was a couple photos, current address and Amazon order #. Great company to deal with, they have my full enthusiastic recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: The seat cover's non slip grip is the best part of this seat cover
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover's non slip grip is the best part of this seat cover. The material is great too and can easy be washed off. The issue I have is that the two handles that get pushed between the seats has already ripped which now won't let it stay in place now. Very disappointing. I do believe the manufacturer has a lifetime warranty so I need to speak to them directly about getting a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ardire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best car seat cover/hammock. I have two big dogs, and the cover holds up well and is easy to install. The hammock doesn’t prevent my dogs from coming into the front seat, but it adds extra space to the backseat. The dogs can lay partially on the hammock, creating extra backseat room. Just throw it in the washer on gentle cycle to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great, and has held up to South Florida heat for 4 years. I'm really happy with this seat cover. I really like the adjustable head straps, the tube thingies that you push behind the seat to keep the cover from sliding off the seat, and the side flaps that you tuck in. It is a well thought-out product.
customer_reviews.author: Colo. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I purposely bought this car cover along with another to test durability and functionality and I'm sad to report that it doesn't hold up to it's price point nor promise. The material does slide around a lot and it has no side covering to prevent damage to the door frame when my dog enters the car. Perhaps I can this cover used for smaller dogs but having a 65+/- pound dog, it certainly doesn't hold up well. The material is also thinner than originally expected leaving wet marks below the leather seats of my car. If you have a smaller dog, this may be a possible option for you but personally I would recommend something else...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat hold strap ripped after 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover for 1 week. I have a 9 year old husky, who is gentle and has been in and out of the car ever since he was a pup. I have had multiple covers over the years and never had one ripped within the first week. Upon removing the cover to clean the car/seats one of the straps that goes through the orange handle ripped out and now the cover wont stay in place. Hopefully th seller will see this review and remedy this situation for me. otherwise I'll have to try and return it.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried this first
customer_reviews.text: I was set to buy the expensive brand for our new car. I read the description of this item and it seemed to be sincere. I thought I'd use Prime and try this first and am glad I did. We had a few of the cheapo ones and this is a big step up. No reason to spend anymore money as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: and the material is good quality. It's unlikely that the hammock feature will ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this 4 stars because it doesn't fit perfectly in the back seat of my wife's 2016 CRV, but that's not really the products fault. The loops for the headrest and the Velcro openings for the seat belt buckles aren't quite in the correct locations but close enough to get the job done. the overall size is spot on, and the material is good quality. It's unlikely that the hammock feature will ever be used, so I'd have been happier with skirting along the front of the bench. I have the hammock/skirt tucked neatly under the rubber floor mat. It will keep the mud and water off the leather, and that's what I bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: So far so Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am LOVING it!! Feels VERY well made and appears to be very high quality materials and workmanship put into this cover! The design fits my back seat perfectly (Toyota 4Runner) and all openings line up perfect with the seat belt buckles and child restraint harness points which allow me to put down the cover and then install the carseat and everything looks as if it was made custom for it! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Update for Dog Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Update to earlier review. Used this this past weekend and it seems just fine, it did a great job of containing the dog hair and keeping my seats clean. the front turned a bit staticky when trying to remove the dog hair but that only caused a small delay. When I took it out to clean and store it, I found three small areas on the back where the nonslip backing already has holes. Not sure how long that will hold up and not sure how to mend that but have not contacted the manufacturer yet to see what they recommend. My seats are leather so there was nothing there to cause the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fits our Hyundai Elantra perfect, didn't need large
customer_reviews.text: Solid, doesn't slide. Fits our Hyundai Elantra perfect, didn't need large. Strong material that hasn't torn since we bought it 1 month ago. Easy to put in and take out (30 secs if you are a normal person) buckles are secure despite other reviews of they breaking. Only thibg is that the adjustable straps slide/loosen fairly easily and therefore the hammock portion lowers or the back seat becomes exposed. Just gotta tighten it when needed. Very good product, saved our car and now I don't stress if our dog rolls in the mud. Thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Keep it tight
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay tight. I have to tighten it every time so my dog can’t jump into the front seat.
customer_reviews.author: sherri ketcherside

customer_reviews.title: Strong and German Shepherd approved
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog seat hammock I’ve purchased. And I’ve had German shepherds for 20 years so I’ve bought DOZENS of brands of car hammocks. Nothing will last forever with big dogs that go everywhere with you both this is damn near perfect. This will be the brand I will purchase again. Finally.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.and I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Toyota Rav 4 Oct 2016. It did good holding the dirt and hair and vacuumed ok. Yesterday I discovered it was not the least bit waterproof. My lab had diarrhea and could not hold it and it went straight through and soaked my back seats! Very disappointed. Not sure I would recommend or buy again. Washed for the first time yesterday, cold water, air dried. Materiel feels weak and has pilled. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: RN2travel2

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good seat cover. It fits our Toyota Tundra truck's backseat very well. It is also very washable. Just a few days after we put it on the seat we had to transport a dog to the emergency vet. The blood didn't completely wash out, but it only left a small stain. We also didn't get it in the washer right away, which would have helped get rid of the stain. So, well worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly & it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! The anchors hold it tight to the seat, the straps fit quickly around the head rests. Both dogs have been comfortable in it. I didn’t think I would use the hammock part, but it keeps the puppy in the back and keeps them both from falling forward in the case of a quick stop. We’ve used this is a Jeep Grand Cherokee, Cherokee, and Acura RDX. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: waterproof yes, until you wash it to clean it ...
customer_reviews.text: waterproof yes, until you wash it to clean it. the backing flaked off and caused a huge mess in my washer. If you get this, spot clean only. Do not put it in your washer. 11/1/15 update: the company sent me a new one stating the one I had was defective and hence the problem with the backing. Customer service is great. Haven't put the new one in yet but it is much appreciated the company stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A dog and car owners must have!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this years ago. Perfect for my German Shepherd in the back seat of my accord, protecting the leather seats while containing her fur and dirt well. Good material and performance. My only complaint is that the top edges flap in the wind with windows down, but it is not very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: William Ward

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you don't buy this for a car, it doesn't fit very well to me and puckers up and lays on the floor to be stepped on. If you have a bigger vehicle it might work better buy my Pontiac G6 was a bad fit .
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this seat cover to protect my leather seats in my 2012 4-door Jeep Wrangler from my 3 pitbulls. The regular size is a perfect fit and keeps the dogs contained to the back seat. It gives them a stable and safe area for them to stand/lay without having to worry about them falling into the foot area. Material is thick and I have no worries of them damaging the leather seats under.. The black matches my interior and when not in the canopy position the cover is barely noticeable. Very happy and my pups are even happier
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D.

customer_reviews.title: not much different than the less expensive
customer_reviews.text: The straps and plastic buckles that go around the headrests are a little wider than the last (less expensive) one of these i purchased. The material is a stiff yet thin nylon, very loud as the dogs move back and forth over it. very limited padding. the company advertises itself as American, but the seat cover packaging indicates this is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Micha

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs contained to the back seat and keeps the seat clean
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect solution for protecting the back seat (leather) of my husband's new Ram 2500 - it fits way better than the cheap one we bought at that bb&b place. With the hammock style, it keeps the dogs (two Westies) from jumping up to the front seat, too. Expensive, but very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dog Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install for my Honda Civic. I live at the beach so this is a lifesaver for the life of my backseat. 2 dogs, wet and sandy and it holds up. Not quite waterproof, but not bad for being at the beach all the time all year. I place a sheet underneath cover and keep a towel in the backseat. Works very well. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jax max man

customer_reviews.title: Best dog hammock I've ever owned! Truly non-slip.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog hammock I've ever owned. It truly is non-slip. I have leather seats which my other hammocks slipped on quite a bit, causing my dog to trip. This hammock doesn't budge when my dog is moving around, and it was very easy to install. This hammock also fits better than any other I've tried, and I attribute it to the adjustable straps for the headrests so you can custom fit it to your car. It fits like a glove in my Honda CRV, and I would highly recommend this product to anyone. The company is also wonderful, and sent me an email for my lifetime warranty within days after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems very well built. We’ve had one for our puppy for one car for about 4 months and just purchased another for a new car. Generally it works well for dirt and muddy paws. However, our puppy threw up on the cover. We were a short distance from home (10 minutes). In that time, the cover soaked through and the seat was wet. Now trying to clean the stain out of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon, Wis

customer_reviews.title: Holding up rather well! Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I will have to get you a photo of this product. I was pleasantly surprised. I have a large 80 lb dog that's rather rough a doberman. He loves to jump in and out of the vehicle. And this product is still holding up well. We'll go to the dog park almost every day. So it gets quite a bit of use! Yes I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Poe & Dro

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The cover is nice to protect your seats. If you have front seats that don’t have a headrest that goes up then you can’t make the hammock hold up. It works great in my mom’s car. In my car it slides off and doesn’t protect my seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Over time, head straps deteriorated due to sun exposure.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product and it worked will for almost a year. But having this installed 100% of the time in my car, the head straps began to deteriorate from being in the sun for hours on end while I was at work. They started to become very brittle and they basically fell apart. I am in the market for a new cover and will probably look to make sure that the head straps are made of a natural material and not a plastic synthetic material that will break down over time in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago135

customer_reviews.title: The best to protect seats.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to clean. Our black lab loves it. Hooks to back of front seats and keeps dog from sliding off seat when stopping quickly. We take it out and sweep hair off with sweeper and then replace. Easy. I have also washed it with soap and water hose and dried on line. Smells nice and clean and dog likes it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: We just RECIEVED our hammock today, installed it and are very much in like with it. Now I'm interested see how a Tan stands up to the features of the brand since I too have a Doberman puppy and the owners have two. Rained today and winced at thought of going anywhere because of the weather and keeping it clean , so we'll see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Jo Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Hair Really Sticks to It
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, easy to install, seat cover, however, my dog's hair really sticks to this thing. It does not even come off in the washing machine so after washing, I have to vacuum intensely to get the hair off. I would have preferred a material that you can easily brush the hair off. Otherwise, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: sward8

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this seat cover was way better than I had expected! I drive a Silverado pickup and ordered the car/truck smaller size -- it fits 100% perfectly across my rear bench seat. There is zero sag, there is no stretching, and my kids car seat goes right in without having to make adjustments or cuts. I use this primarily because my kid loves to throw his cup or his toys all over my truck; the hammock feature keeps it all off the ground and in his area where he can reach it again if he needs it. Plus, no more spilled drinks all over my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: EAsy to install and very protective
customer_reviews.text: Love how this protects the back seat and we got the hammock style so our dog (A Brittany) can be blocked from coming up front. Super easy to install and if she sheds a bit, we just wipe off the seat cover with our hand to move the hair off. I would think very easy to clean if we got mud on there but it is very durable. Slots for safety belts of course....also bought the matching door covers to prevent our dog from scuffing up the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Seitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, but mine isn't waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, covers seat well. However, the one I received is NOT waterproof, which I discovered when my young dog became carsick. Vomit soaked right through, necessitating a thorough cleaning of the underlying upholstery. I now have a heavy plastic drop cloth tucked beneath the cover. The cover does a good job catching dirt and mud, but did not provide any protection from fluids. Certainly wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate L.

customer_reviews.title: Hammock
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is thick and washes very well. So I was hoping it would last a long time. The only problem I have, my Doberman jumps up to get in the SUV, and the seam on this side near the door, has come apart. I'm sure his nails has caught on the seam and ripped the thread. I believe a thicker more durable thread should be used., so this wouldn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Very easy to install, and therefore, very easy to switch from car to car. Could use a little extra padding on the bottom but that’s an easy fix by laying a blanket down before “installing.” I put that in quotes as it’s literally 4 clips...1 around each head rest. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but needs plastic cargo snaps on the head rests that strap to the seats
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because this item desperately needs plastic snaps or buckles for the straps that go around the back of the head rests. I frequently have people in my back seat. Instead of just a simple snap so I can fold it down I have to pull an adjust the strap repeatedly. Then to put it back, do the same. Frustrating. I have a boxer and this is great for him. I've purchased a few other pet hammocks that were cheaper in price and in quality. Hopefully it holds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal R

customer_reviews.title: Borderline useless once it falls apart completely
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean (you realize dogs make it dirty, right?) It comes apart from seams pretty quickly it will be useless floppy fabric. It's also not water resistant, the back end of the fabric leeches water on seats. Dont let a dirty wet dog on it... Kind of defeats the point.
customer_reviews.author: Devon W.

customer_reviews.title: Really Holds Up
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install. I have two dogs. A pit and a massif. Both very messy at times from the dog park or beach. It does stay true to being waterproof. Easy to wash, I recommend air drying. Love the black and Secures to seat to prevent sliding. Well made, very lightweight but yet still thick and durable. It's been my favorite one. I've had mine 10 months now and still no tears, or shredding, or etc. It is starting to lose it's shape as two dogs can be rough on martials. However, from a realistic point of view it has last longer then 60-90 days with my dogs and that's a WIN!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for use with kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my Range Rover from my three young children. While it would protect the seat from spills, the crumbs just fall into the seatbelt openings. Also the middle seat belt can't be used without crunching the middle back of the cover down, because it comes from the roof in the back. Hard to explain without a picture. It's not made for children in mind, but still has the slits for all 3 back seat belts. The XL is to big for a Range Rover Hse. Definitely wouldn't fit a sport, since they're smaller. I sure wish someone would make one of these for children.
customer_reviews.author: Perfectionista

customer_reviews.title: Nissan Rogue - High quality, easy to install, fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was super fast. This product couldn’t be easier to install... I was able to put it in my car in under a minute. Ready to go! It’s very adjustable so I can switch it between my husband’s car and mine. I love the hammock option because it keeps Dexter from coming up front. He’s an overgrown baby who still thinks he’s a lapdog puppy who can ride on mama’s lap while she drives. He is not a puppy. He is an American bully who doesn’t know his own weight! Haha. I couldn’t be happier with this dog seat cover and Dexter loves it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs or whatever else is back there.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to use for my dog, but now I just use it all the time. It’s easy to clean, and one time a 12 pack of sparkling water leaked all over it and none of it got through. Super easy to clean too. Installing is pretty self-explanatory too.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great, Well-Made Product
customer_reviews.text: I spent lots of time online looking for the ideal seat cover for the back seats of my 2015 Chevrolet Silverado 3500HD Crew Cab. There's lots out there, but this seemed like the perfect fit for what I need. I need a cover that installs and removes quickly with no hassles, that is well-made and will last a long time. Never did I think I would get it right on my first try, but this 4Knines cover is perfect. I bought the XL size which is just right for my truck. I recommend this cover to anybody looking for a high-quality, heavy-duty, easy-to-use rear seat cover
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: This company is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This company is AMAZING!!! I purchased this cover because the picture looked like it was nice looking and a quality cover. I love how it fits and looks in the car and also the side flaps to protect the whole seat. I did have an issue with it and contacted 4Knines and they were able to resolve the issue almost immediately. They are truly amazing. I will definitely purchase from them again. If you want an attractive and quality product, purchase this cover. You won't be sorry and their customer service is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent, would be better if it had a middle zipper and higher sidewalls
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if it had a zipper on front piece so it could be used if someone needs to sit in back with the dog. The side flaps are small and don't cover much. Had trouble getting both the rubber pieces pushed in to hold onto seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: This appears to be a pretty rugged bulldog hammock
customer_reviews.text: It may even be bulldog proof.. My English Bulldog Bella has rolled and wriggled her way thru 2 other Hammocks in less than 2 years.. usually because she wears thru the stitching. This appears to be made of much tougher construction.. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Researched covers extensively and decided on this one. Excellent choice! We have had our puppy since he was 9 weeks; he is now 9 months old and weighs about 55 lbs. He loves to ride in the “hammock” part of the cover which puts strain on the headrest straps. We have not had any problems w the straps (or cover) ripping. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good backseat cover for your pooch
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this, I nailed it on the first purchase. Back is non-slip for the dog, fits the car well, looks good, pieces to hold it in are good. Don't use the hammock feature, this is great for the back of my BMW
customer_reviews.author: Gstar

customer_reviews.title: #1 Dog Cover I have ever used (and I have tried many)
customer_reviews.text: This is the most wonderful dog cover I have ever used. Well worth the money. It doesn't move around at all when the dog jumps in and out of the car. So I don't get mud or dirt on my seats at all. Also the sides of the seat are covered well and can be tucked in (I don't use it as a hammock). I am 100% satisfied with this dog cover and would highly recommend it. I implore you to spend the extra money on a dog cover that does not move. It will save you a lot of cleaning time which is what I had to do with previous covers.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: We have a very energetic husky who loves to run She gets dirty paws and sheds a lot and had one accident on a long trip. The seats stay clean and this is easy to throw in the washer and dryer and then put back in. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: alibubba

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself in first week!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover paid for itself in the first week. I have a Golden Retriever puppy and had tried a set of bars to keep her in the read of my SUV, but she pulled that down on day one. So I tried this seat cover and on our way to the vet - well - let's just say I got a fresh sample off the cover. THANK GOODNESS - I can not imagine what my leather seats would look like now. I got the XL - but may have been able to get way with the Large for my BMW X3. Easy to install and she likes it, too. THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patte

customer_reviews.title: Back not really non slip
customer_reviews.text: I researched for the best one and thought this will be it. I'm more concerned about the cover slipping and sliding as my puppy moves around and this has been one of the company's selling point. The back didn't feel very non slip and doesn't really prevent it from sliding from our leather seats. There's no grip to them at all. When my pup got out of the car tonight the cover slipped under her back legs. It definitely freaked her out. Luckily she didn't end up hurting herself.
customer_reviews.author: Jamia Canlas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High quality product! Love the look and feel, and especially like the hammock feature that prevents our 60 lb lab from sliding into the floor space or trying to share the front seat with us. The cover is really well made, looks and feels solid. Would definitely buy again, though I'm sure I won't need to because this product will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: yogadog1

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, well sized for a mid size SUV like the Lexus RX350
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new RX350. It fits well, but I wish the split seat option 40/20/40 (or whatever it actually is) was shown clearly if available through Amazon, because I would have bought that version to allow more flexibility in usage of the fold down rear seats and center console/armrest. When I went to the manufacturers website for more info after my purchase arrived, I saw the split seat version. It is made well, but I think it is a little too expensive (but so is my car, lol)
customer_reviews.author: BobL

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! Having just purchased a 2015 Honda CR-V
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Having just purchased a 2015 Honda CR-V, I needed a good seat cover to protect my investment from my two rambunctious pugs. This seat cover does the trick. I utilized the front straps to form a pug hammock in the backseat and the seat belt harness attachments fit through the velcro openings just perfectly. The end result, happy pugs (or as happy as they can be when they are headed to the vet) and a happier owner. The seat cover is quality construction and looks like it will survive may years of use. By the way, I ordered the regular size which was plenty big for the CR-V.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Buff

product_meta.title: 4Knines Dog Seat Cover with Hammock for Cars, Trucks and SUVs - Heavy Duty, Non Slip, Waterproof - USA Based
feature_bullets: Rated "BEST OF THE BEST" car seat covers for pets by Best Reviews as an Amazon Editorial Recommendation in April 2019. HAMMOCK OPTION - access seat belts & LATCH anchors. Regular measures 54" wide.
HEAVY-DUTY Materials and Components - 600D polyester, thick straps, and nylon clips. All components are colorfast.
WATERPROOF & NON-SLIP LAYER - Special solid waterproof layer makes the seat bottom completely waterproof (seams and stitching are not watertight).

EASY TO INSTALL & CLEAN - Installs in seconds with quick-release clips and sturdy seat anchors. Hose it down, wipe down with a moist towel, or toss it in the washer to keep it looking fresh and clean.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - No-hassle 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee & Lifetime Warranty (defects in materials or workmanship - US purchases only).

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
